summary: An Ordinance providing for the laying off, widening, extending, altering and establishing of East Forty-fifth Street, from Fifteenth Avenue Northeast to the northeast corner of Section Sixteen (16), Township Twenty-five (25) North of Range Four (4) East W. M., and Fifteenth Avenue Northeast, from East Forty-fifth Street, to the harbor line of Lake Union Shore Lands, all in the City of Seattle; and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor, and providing for the payment of such improvement by special assessment upon property benefited, in the manner provided by law.
